resources.string: Lorem Ipsum is simply placeholder text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry\'s standard placeholder text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book"
Represents a view to invoke an action
Represents an image view in the item

# Tip 1 - Avoid Using 2 Columns Resume As It Is Not ATS Friendly.

# Tip 2 - Prepare Role Specific Resume. Read The Job Description And Requirements And Prepare Your Resume Accordingly.

# Tip 3 - Things Not To Mention In Your Resume : 
• DOB
• Photo 
• Religious Affiliation

# Tip 4 - Try Adding Numbers And Quantify As Many Bullet Points As Possible.

# Tip 5 - If You Are A Fresher, Stick To One Page Resume Only.
Imp. Note: Never Ever Lie In Your Resume Because Honesty Is Something That Companies Don\'t Compromise On.

string-array.name: group1
string-array.item: At Intern Freak We Post Daily updates on internships and job postings! Our vision is to empower the youth of our nation and make them Atmanirbhar (Self-dependent). By providing them with all kinds of opportunities from various sectors, sharing knowledge and make them competent enough so that they could excel in any field.

string-array.name: group2
string-array.item: We don not guarantee a job/internship, but what we do guarantee is that you would not miss any updates from us.
